title: Finance Ministry Warns IAS, IPS Officers of Stringent Action for Giving Wrong Info to Centre on Borrowing - News18
content: Finance Ministry Warns IAS, IPS Officers of Stringent Action for Giving Wrong Info to Centre on Borrowing  News18
description: The letter said in case of wrong financial information, facts, and names of relevant IAS, IPS officers would be communicated to DoPT, which might act against them on matters concerning their empanelment, central deputation, foreign training
